name: exchange_range
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool changenow_crypto_exchange. Tool description: Empower your business by letting your customers buy, sell, and exchange crypto. You will earn % on every transaction. 400+ cryptocurrencies and 75+ fiats are available. IMPORTANT: You should get your API key by creating a partner's account here: changenow.io/affiliate. Or email us: partners@changenow.io. API description: New! The API endpoint returns minimal payment amount and maximum payment amount required to make an exchange. If you try to exchange less than minimum or more than maximum, the transaction will most likely fail. Any pair of assets has minimum amount and some of pairs have maximum amount.

Successful response:

from_to.description: Underscore separated pair of asset tickers (e.g., 'btc_usd').
